content: close top of hat bring tail to ws and weave in your ends crown for adult hat to decrease faster or slower add or remove a few of the knit rounds round 1 k14 k2tog 7 times = 105 sts round 12 knit round 2 knit round 13 k8 k2tog 7 times = 63 sts round 3 k13 k2tog 7 times = 98 sts round 14 k7 k2tog 7 times = 56 sts round 4 knit round 15 k6 k2tog 7 times = 49 sts round 5 k12 k2tog 7 times = 91 sts round 16 k5 k2tog 7 times = 42 sts round 6 knit round 17 k4 k2tog 7 times = 35 sts round 7 k11 k2tog 7 times = 84 sts round 18 k3 k2tog 7 times = 28 sts round 8 knit round 19 k2 k2tog 7 times = 21 sts round 9 k10 k2tog 7 times = 77 sts round 20 k1 k2tog 7 times = 14 sts round 10 knit round 21 k2tog 7 times = 7 sts round 11 k9 k2tog 7 times = 70 sts cut a long tail draw it through the remaining sts to close top of hat bring tail to ws and weave in your ends tassels and finishing with dpns pick up 3 sts at bottom of earflap knit i-cord with these 3 sts until you achieve desired length bobble and create a knot with i-cord at the end repeat on other earflap weave in any ends and block as desired copyright 2007 by tiennie for tiennie knits at http //tiennie com this pattern is for private use only the pattern images or products made from the pattern may not be sold without the express written consent of the designer if you have any questions or find any errors please contact me at tiennieknits@comcast net thanks page 2 of 2
